title: # 481 - Van Neistat & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with Van Neistat. Van is a film maker, artist, and brother of Casey Neistat. We talk about how he became such a handy man, technology changing, getting sober, Mexico trips, motorcycles, his favorite brands, and much more! 

 

Risking an 18 Year Old Friendship video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1YxsTIfxhk0 

 

Follow Van here:

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/VanNeistat 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/vanneistat 

 

This episode is brought to you by Noom. Sign up for your trial today at http://www.noom.com/bertcast   

 

This episode is also brought to you by Fiverr. Go to https://www.fiverr.com and use code “Bert” for 10% off your first order.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Helix Sleep. Go to http://www.helixsleep.com/bert to get $200 off all mattress orders and 2 free pillows! 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Grunt Style. Go to http://www.gruntstyle.com/discount/bert for an additional 10% off your first order of any items. 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: http://www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
